participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and sociable, Jake loves meeting new people and enjoys lively activities.
participant_1.background: I work part time at a pizza restaurant. My major is business. I love the beach. I like to party.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Creative and passionate, Emily has a love for music and enjoys exploring new hobbies.
participant_2.background: My mom taught me how to play the cello. Everyday I go swimming at the y. My favorite color is blue. I collect stamps. I love going to concerts on the weekend.

content.text: What's your favorite thing to do on weekends?
I love going to concerts! I try to go to as many as I can.
That's awesome! I love concerts too. What kind of music do you like?
I listen to a lot of different things, but I really like rock and roll.
Me too! I love going to see live bands.
Me too! I love the energy of a live concert.
So, what's the last concert you went to?
I just went to a Green Day concert a few weeks ago. It was so much fun!
Oh, I love Green Day! I've seen them a few times in concert.
What's your favorite Green Day song?
I don't know if I could pick a favorite song, but I really like "Basket Case" and "American Idiot."
What's your favorite thing about concerts?
I love the energy of the crowd and the way everyone is just there to have a good time.
Me too! Concerts are so much fun.
I'm glad you like concerts. We should go to one together sometime.
That sounds like a great idea! I'd love to go to a concert with you.
